about_the_game:
This game is a Mystery Dungeon-style roguelike.

Whenever the player takes an action, other monsters act as well… Progress through the dungeon using a turn-based system!

During your adventure, you’ll encounter monster girls. Give them drinks, befriend them, or challenge them to a test of strength—if they acknowledge you, they’ll become your trusted Friends!

Story

As an adventurer, you suddenly find yourself trapped within a mysterious barrier.

According to Tarte, a monster you meet in the Starting Village, the only way to escape is to defeat the Tower Mage who resides in the Tower of Return.

Defeat the mage, break the barrier, and escape safely… Your mysterious adventure begins!

content_descriptors.notes: This content includes characters with revealing outfits that may not be suitable for all ages.

detailed_description:
Remastered Edition

"Monster Girl and the Mysterious Adventure Remastered Edition" is a refined remaster of the game originally released in March 2020, featuring enhanced graphics and improved systems. All graphics, including characters, dungeons, items, and UI, have been completely revamped.

While there are minimal changes to the characters, items, and dungeons available, if you are playing "Monster Girl and the Mysterious Adventure" for the first time, we highly recommend starting with this Remastered Edition.

Please note that save data from the original "Monster Girl and the Mysterious Adventure" cannot be transferred.

short_description: Turn monster girls into your "Friends" and embark on an adventure together! This is a rogue-like game inspired by "Mystery Dungeon," where the terrain changes every time you challenge it.
